fact_list.fact_text: The U-turn facility is located ahead.
Three turning lanes are located ahead.
Four waiting lanes are located ahead.
Stop for pedestrians crossing the road.
There is a Bus Priority Box, also known as Mandatory Give-Way to Buses.
Stop before the Give-Way lines and give way to buses which are waiting to leave the bus stop.
Do not stay in the yellow Give-Way Bus Box.
Give way to buses exiting the bus bay.
An exclusive left turn and shared left turn lane are ahead, usually along expressways.
